channel.title: Changing ip on a project insanity base
channel.description:
I am running a Project insanity base, and other than my own client, my friends cant connect. The only ip that I looked online that you change is the one in the client.java client side.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/855/portsm.png/][IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/4725/portsm.th.png[/img][/URL]
my ports are forwarded
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/39/clientjava.png/][IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/4797/clientjava.th.png[/img][/URL]
changed the IP in client.java
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/94/altogethaa.png/][IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/5729/altogethaa.th.png[/img][/URL]
this is me trying to load the server on a different client, like my friends would be on a different computer, and it shows my no-ip is setup, the thing I noticed is that the server .bat file says that its loading at 127.0.0.1 which is like the offline one, how do I switch that?
sorry the pics turned out so small :o

item.title: Changing ip on a project insanity base
item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

and it works now?

I am running a Project insanity base, and other than my own client, my friends cant connect. The only ip that I looked online that you change is the one in the client.java client side.
